pr_title: Implement cardinality check for a nested ARRAY

timeline.message: Move cast method from TypeInfo to Value
Remove some no-op data type conversions
Pass TypeInfo and conversion mode to Value.convertTo()
Don't call Value.convertScale() from other packages
Merge convertScale() methods into main convertTo*() methods
Remove incorrect precision conversion from NUMERIC data type
Merge convertPrecision() methods into main convertTo*() methods
Merge checkPrecision() methods into main convertTo*() methods
Merge ExtTypeInfo.cast() methods into main Value.convertTo*() methods
Implement cardinality check for a nested ARRAY

timeline.author: grandinj
